desc:
Please can I have a data extract of the following data?

1.	All verified Maintenance Order and Maintenance Substitution Order.records across both Fast Track and Full Index 360 Capturing systems.
2.	The respondentâ€™s ID number must match the attached set of ID numbers from Ariva.
3.	If there is a record with the same auto sort ref on both systems, please only include the record from the full Index 360 system.
4.	There must be a value greater than 0 in either or both the spousal and child maintenance amount. In the case of the full system, the total child maintenance amount should be provided.
5.	The respondentâ€™s ID number must have a value, must be 13 digits/chars.
6.	Duplicates: Only the top 1 record must be extracted based on the following fields:
a.	First check the amount of records with the same Respondent ID number. (This is possible if they have more than one Maintenance Order)
b.	Second field to look at is Case Reference Number and Court Name. If the duplicates have the same Respondent ID number, Case Ref No and Court Name, only provide the top 1.

The following fields should be included on the report:

â€¢	FastTrack
â€¢	CaseID
â€¢	Case Ref No
â€¢	Case Number
â€¢	Court Name
â€¢	Case Type
â€¢	Case Reason
â€¢	Granted Date
â€¢	Applicant Name 1
â€¢	Applicant Name 2
â€¢	Applicant Name 3
â€¢	Applicant Surname
â€¢	Applicant ID Number
â€¢	Respondent Name 1
â€¢	Respondent Name 2
â€¢	Respondent Name 3
â€¢	Respondent Surname
â€¢	Respondent ID Number
â€¢	Spousal Maintenance Amount
â€¢	Child Maintenance Amount

Logged by Neil
name: CW - CCW387 - I360 Data extract - Ariva ID Wash
